version_description:
1.增加了英文版，外国朋友可以更好的跟小译玩耍了~
2.增加了口音设置，可以试试跟小译说说广东话。不过该功能还在测试中，欢迎给我们提反馈意见，让我们进步得更快！

1.增加了英文版，外国朋友可以更好的跟小译玩耍了~
2.增加了口音设置，可以试试跟小译说说广东话。不过该功能还在测试中，欢迎给我们提反馈意见，让我们进步得更快！

If you are not completely satisfied with a translation result, you can touch and hold it to send us a translation that you think is more accurate! We invite everybody to come and teach LingoCloud something new!

You can now mute LingoCloud to enter

If you are not completely satisfied with a translation result, you can touch and hold it to send us a translation that you think is more accurate! We invite everybody to come and teach LingoCloud something new!

You can now mute LingoCloud to enter

1.LingoCloud now allows users to provide feedback on translation accuracy by pressing "like" or "unlike" when prompted.
2.The newly added voice speed adjustment makes your listening skills practise easier!
3.Added App-sharing button so that you can

1. The dialect mode can now identify and read aloud different Chinese dialects!
2. Renamed "Portal", a curated list of our favorite websites, to "Find". Also added an entry point to "Find" at the bottom left corner of the App's homepage.

1. The dialect mode can now identify and read aloud different Chinese dialects!
2. Renamed "Portal", a curated list of our favorite websites, to "Find". Also added an entry point to "Find" at the bottom left corner of the App's homepage.

Fixed a bug on iPad which prevented jumping to a new search page when clicking the upper part of the screen.
Fixed a bug on iPad which prevented jumping to a new search page when clicking the upper part of the screen.

1. We hid 20 Lucky Phrases from the famous voice actors JIE and SU SHANGQING in LingoCloud! Come and try to find them! Tip: Check out LingoCloud's Weibo account for clues!
